name: Celestial Escape (crokakahane, kurokitto, BGPlayz, UnderUrBedz)
description:
Lucifer has been locked up in Heaven and has broken free from his chains. Fight all that is Holy and Mighty in order to escape Heaven once and for all and make your way back to your kingdom in Hell!
